answers.answer: My brothers wife was diagnosed with preclampsia...you need to be careful with it... For you and your baby
I had it with my first baby i would go n get checked out just to be safe . Cn be bad 4 u n baby x
I would go tonight. Preeclampsia can turn quick and with a lot more noticeable swelling it would be a better idea to get evaluated sooner rather than later.
The headache has finally worn off now but my feet are still swollen. wish I could take my own blood pressure.

I was the SAME WAY with my first and I called my doc n told him what was going on and he told me to go to hospital asap and they ended up taking my daughter Emergency csection that day. How far r u? I was a couple days from 36 weeks theb. She was only 5lbs 15oz but very healthy.  N got to go home when I went home.
I'm 37 weeks Wednesday.  Their monitoring my blood pressure weekly at my docs. but I'm high risk and on clexane as previous dvts post pregnancy. had scan last week and she weighs 6lb 7. x

I am having the same problems as you. I am trying to wait for my doctor's appointment tomorrow too. I have been monitoring my bp and it is staying high like 140/100.  I know my doctor will admit me in the morning and I just want to spend my last night before baby a comfortable as possible. I am almost 38w.
I got my appointment this afternoon...hope all goes well for you. Please keep us updated. x

question: hi all. I've had high blood pressure in pregnancy and the last week my feet, ankles and hands have swelled.  today I've been resting but my feet look like elephant. I've had an head ache all day too. I've have my blood pressure checked weekly as from tomorrow do you think I should wait for tomorrow's appointment or go to maternity assessment unit tonight.  Thanks claire (uk)
title: preclampsia or edema
